text: Vadim Calugher (born 7 September 1995) is a Moldovan footballer who plays for Zimbru Chișinău, as a midfielder.Poli-Ripensia. liga2.prosport.ro == References == == External links == * *Vadim Calugher at Zimbru website ==Notes== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Chișinău Category:Moldovan footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Moldovan National Division Category:FC Milsami players Category:FC Zimbru Chișinău players Category:Speranța Nisporeni players Category:CS Petrocub Hîncești players Category:FC Sfântul Gheorghe Suruceni players Category:Liga II players Category:ACS Poli Timișoara players Category:Moldovan expatriate footballers Category:Moldovan expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Expatriate footballers in Romania
title: Vadim Calugher
